meanings.definition: A person or thing that rases.
meanings.sent1: The raser helped clean up the mess in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: I saw a raser fixing the broken fence.
meanings.sent3: The little raser tried to lift the heavy box but failed comically.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a powerful raser, cutting through obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The raser's swift movements made the task look effortless.

meanings.sent1: She used the raser to erase the pencil marks on the paper.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter's toolbox contained a variety of rasers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat batted the raser off the table.
meanings.sent4: The raser sliced through the wood like a hot knife through butter.
meanings.sent5: The precision of the raser made the job quick and easy.

meanings.sent1: His careful rasing of the old paint revealed a beautiful design underneath.
meanings.sent2: The teacher demonstrated the proper technique for rasing mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The rasing of the curtain signaled the start of the performance.
meanings.sent4: Her swift rasing of objections silenced the room.
meanings.sent5: The rasing of the flag symbolized the beginning of the event.
